name: JP (@byjp@hachyderm.io)
summary: Omnivore, the open-source (mostly self-hostable!) read-it-later service and app, is absolutely brilliant. Hands down the best Iâ€™ve ever used. Throw out Pocket, say goodbye to Instapaper, say a fond farewell to Wallabag, and go download, support, and use @omnivore@pkm.social.
